TEXT.TITLE: NEWCOR <NEW> NAMES NEW CHAIRMAN
TEXT.BODY: Newcor Inc said its board elected William Mitchell as chairman succeeding Frank Gofrank, who is retiring as chairman but remains a director. In other action, Newcor's board approved payment of a regular quarterly dividend of eight cts on May one, record April 15. Reuter
